Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
Class GameController receives parameters relative to game moves from GameHandler and communicates with model's Game class in order to apply those moves. Depending on the model's response GameController builds a new message that will be sent to one or more players.

    Method applyEffect10 manages the execution of Personality 10's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the switch between at most two student tiles from the current player's lobby with as many from his board's table.

    applyEffect11(String player, int cardStudentIndex)
    Method applyEffect11 manages the execution of Personality 11's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the displacement of a student tile from the card to the acting player's table.

    Method applyEffect12 manages the execution of Personality 12's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the removal of at most three students of the chosen color from each player's table.

    Method applyEffect3 manages the execution of Personality 3's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the computation of the players influence on a chosen island.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(boolean isExpert, ArrayList<String> players)
      Constructor GameController creates a new GameController instance.
      Parameters:
      isExpert - game mode for the match, can be expert or base.
      players - nicknames of the players taking part in the game.

  • Method Details

    • handleGameInstantiation

      public Message handleGameInstantiation()
      Method handleGameInstantiation communicates with Game class in order to begin a new match. It also sets the listening system between GameController and GameHandler.
      Returns:
      a Message instance containing the first status of the game.

    • updateWizardSelection

      public Message updateWizardSelection(String player, Integer wizard)
      Method updateWizardSelection handles the selection of a wizard deck by a player. If the selection is not legal the player is being sent a GameError message.
      Parameters:
      player - name of the player choosing a wizard deck.
      wizard - wizard chosen by the player.
      Returns:
      a message relative to the next game phase if the selection is legal, an ErrorMessage instance otherwise.

    • updateTowerSelection

      public Message updateTowerSelection(String player, Tower tower)
      Method updateWizardSelection handles the selection of a Tower by a player. If the selection is not legal the player is being sent a GameError message.
      Parameters:
      player - name of the player choosing a Tower team.
      tower - Tower chosen by the player.
      Returns:
      a message relative to the next game phase if the selection is legal, an ErrorMessage instance otherwise.

    • updateCloudsStudents

      public void updateCloudsStudents()
      Method updateCloudsStudents calls the Game's method responsible for the refilling of clouds' students list.

    • updateAssistantCards

      public Message updateAssistantCards(String player, int cardID)
      Method updateAssistantCards handles the selection of an Assistant card by a player.
      Parameters:
      player - name of the player choosing an Assistant card.
      cardID - priority of the chosen card.
      Returns:
      a message relative to the next game phase if the selection is legal, an ErrorMessage instance otherwise.

    • moveStudentsFromLobby

      public Message moveStudentsFromLobby(String player, ArrayList<Integer> studentIDs, ArrayList<Integer> destIDs)
      Method moveStudentsFromLobby handles the game action carried out by a player of moving three student tiles from his board's lobby to his board's table.
      Parameters:
      player - name of the player responsible for the game action.
      studentIDs - indexes of the students tile being moved from the board's lobby.
      destIDs - destinations of the selected student tiles.
      Returns:
      a message relative to the next game phase if the selection is legal, an ErrorMessage instance otherwise.

    • moveMotherNature

      public Message moveMotherNature(String player, int steps)
      Method moveMotherNature handles the game action carried out by a player of moving Mother Nature from its current island to a new destination island. Furthermore, if the action triggers a end-game condition a message communicating the winner is being sent to all players.
      Parameters:
      player - name of the player responsible for the game action.
      steps - number of steps by which Mother Nature is being moved.
      Returns:
      a message relative to the next game phase if the selection is legal, an ErrorMessage instance otherwise.

    • refillLobby

      public Message refillLobby(String player, int cloudIndex)
      Method refillLobby handles the game action carried out by a player of picking a Cloud tile whose students tile will be moved to his board's lobby.
      Parameters:
      player - name of the player responsible for the game action.
      cloudIndex - identification for the chosen Cloud instance.
      Returns:
      a message relative to the next game phase if the selection is legal, an ErrorMessage instance otherwise.

    • playPersonalityCard

      public Message playPersonalityCard(String player, int cardID, ClientState currentClientState)
      Method playPersonalityCard handles the game action, carried out by a player, of activating a Personality card.
      Parameters:
      player - name of the player responsible for the game action.
      cardID - identification for the chosen Personality card.
      currentClientState - state of the playing client.
      Returns:
      a message relative to the game phase linked to the Personality effect if the selection is legal, an ErrorMessage instance otherwise.

    • resetPersonalityCard

      public void resetPersonalityCard()
      Method resetPersonalityCard cancels the game effects applied as a result of a Personality activation.

    • changeGameRulesForPersonalityCard

      private void changeGameRulesForPersonalityCard(int cardID)
      Method changeGameRulesForPersonalityCard changes a specific game rule as a result of a Personality activation or deactivation. If the input is 0 it sets the rules to their default, otherwise it sets them accordingly to the effect of cardID.
      Parameters:
      cardID - Personality identification used to change a specific game rule.

    • applyEffect1

      public Message applyEffect1(int studentIndex, int islandId)
      Method applyEffect1 manages the execution of Personality 1's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the displacement of a student tile onto an island tile.
      Parameters:
      studentIndex - index of the student which is being affected by the Personality effect.
      islandId - identification number for the destination island.
      Returns:
      null if the effect has been correctly applied, an ErrorMessage instance otherwise.

    • applyEffect3

      public Message applyEffect3(int islandId)
      Method applyEffect3 manages the execution of Personality 3's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the computation of the players influence on a chosen island.
      Parameters:
      islandId - identification number for the chosen island.
      Returns:
      EndGameMessage if the effect has triggered an endgame condition, null if the execution had no side effects, an ErrorMessage instance otherwise.

    • applyEffect5

      public Message applyEffect5(int islandId)
      Method applyEffect5 manages the execution of Personality 5's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the ban of the selected island.
      Parameters:
      islandId - identification number for the chosen island.
      Returns:
      null if the effect has been correctly applied, an ErrorMessage instance otherwise.

    • applyEffect7

      public Message applyEffect7(ArrayList<Integer> cardStudentsIndexes, ArrayList<Integer> lobbyStudentsIndexes)
      Method applyEffect7 manages the execution of Personality 7's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the switch between at most three student tiles from the card with as many from the current player's board's lobby.
      Parameters:
      cardStudentsIndexes - indexes of the chosen card students.
      lobbyStudentsIndexes - indexes of the chosen lobby students.
      Returns:
      null if the effect has been correctly applied, an ErrorMessage instance otherwise.

    • applyEffect9

      public void applyEffect9(Color banned)
      Method applyEffect9 manages the execution of Personality 9's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the ban of a selected color from the influence computation.
      Parameters:
      banned - chosen color to be banned.

    • applyEffect10

      public Message applyEffect10(String player, ArrayList<Color> tableStudents, ArrayList<Integer> lobbyStudentsIndexes)
      Method applyEffect10 manages the execution of Personality 10's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the switch between at most two student tiles from the current player's lobby with as many from his board's table.
      Parameters:
      player - nickname of the player applying the Personality effect.
      tableStudents - colors of the chosen table students.
      lobbyStudentsIndexes - indexes of the chosen lobby students.
      Returns:
      null if the effect has been correctly applied, an ErrorMessage instance otherwise.

    • applyEffect11

      public Message applyEffect11(String player, int cardStudentIndex)
      Method applyEffect11 manages the execution of Personality 11's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the displacement of a student tile from the card to the acting player's table.
      Parameters:
      player - nickname of the player applying the effect.
      cardStudentIndex - indexes of the chosen card student.
      Returns:
      null if the effect has been correctly applied, an ErrorMessage instance otherwise.

    • applyEffect12

      public Message applyEffect12(Color chosenCard)
      Method applyEffect12 manages the execution of Personality 12's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the removal of at most three students of the chosen color from each player's table.
      Parameters:
      chosenCard - color of the students that are being removed from the players' table.
      Returns:
      null if the effect has been correctly applied, an ErrorMessage instance otherwise.

    • closeCurrentRound

      public Message closeCurrentRound()
      Method closeCurrentRound manages the end of a game round by checking if the one just completed was the final one. In this case every player is sent a message with the result (the name of the winner if present, tie otherwise). The current turn's assistant cards are also reset.
      Returns:
      EndGameMessage if an endgame condition has been triggered, null otherwise.

    • setUpdateListener

      public void setUpdateListener(GameHandler gameHandler)
      Method setUpdateListener sets the listener of GameController's update system.
      Parameters:
      gameHandler - GameHandler instance listening to GameController.

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent event)
      Method propertyChange receives an update notification from model classes and hands GameHandler an update message carrying the information about the update.
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      event - event of type PropertyChangeEvent.

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()
      Method getGame returns the Game instance GameController is communicating with.
      Returns:
      Game instance, the model entry point.

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer(String currentPlayer)
      Method setCurrentPlayer updates the name of the currentPlayer in GameController and Game classes.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - nickname of the current player in action.

    • getAvailableWizards

      public ArrayList<Integer> getAvailableWizards()
      Method getAvailableWizards returns the list of wizard decks currently available to players.
      Returns:
      ArrayList containing wizards deck yet to be chosen.

    • getActionPhaseTurnOrder

      public ArrayList<String> getActionPhaseTurnOrder()
      Method getAvailableWizards returns the list of players ordered by their action priority.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of ordered players.
